Name: VEGTERIA - Vegetable Shop Simulator
About the game: Enjoy managing your own vegetables shop . Plant, harvest, buy and sell goods, transport, drive, upgrade, customize your shop to be the best shop owner in the village. Start your vegetables shop in the village , start by ordering goods from local suppliers until you own your truck and farm and start producing your own crops !
